content.description: The crux is the first three moves. Start in the middle of the slab on quartz veins. Work up on tiny feet at the start, get a right-hand jug, and then get high feet to go to a huge jug in the left-hand part of the "Z" formation.
content.protection: Pad - don't fall its a slab...ouch
content.location: Starts in the middle of the slab side of Grandma's Hump; facing the Spider Pig boulder and facing away from the AT.

content.description: Stand start around the corner from Rata En Mi Sopa just to the right of the small boulder on the ground. Work up on crimps, slopers, and pockets to top out. Veers slightly left of Flakes R Us.
content.location: The first route on the high side of the boulder around the corner from Rata En Mi Sopa.

content.description: Start as for Grandma's Cookies but work left on face holds and then traverse the lip to top out on DC Arete.
content.location: Start at Grandma's Cookies and go left on face holds, move up to the lip when they become thin.

content.description: Sit start at the bulge right of Candied Mice and Rata En Mi Sopa below the stand for "What Hump?". Start with your left hand on the better of the two sloping jugs (the higher one) and your right hand on a good undercling. For feet there are crystals straight below or a decent heel hook out right. Move over the bulge with cool compression moves using the vertical rail on the right and continue straight up.
content.location: The sit start to "What Hump?" to the right of Candied Mice and Rata En Mi Sopa.

content.description: Start at the left corner of the slab about 10 feet to the left of Zoro. Work up on slopers and quartz crystals to the top. The total length is about 18 feet; nice long slab!
content.location: Starts 10 feet to the left of Zoro on the far left corner of the slab (the side of Grandma's Hump facing away from the AT.

content.description: Stand start version of Enter The Duat. Kind of silly, just involves a mantle and topping out.
Sit start on the bulge to the right of the big rail where Candied Mice starts, left hand on side pull, right hand on a pinch. Work up on small pockets and rails to a nice jug just before the top out.
content.location: Starts on the side of Grandma's Hump facing the Big Air boulder just right of the rail that Candied Mice starts on and to the left of the right-hand arÃªte.

content.description: Start on the overhung low side of the Grandma's Hump boulder and traverse to the left around the corner. Finish just to the right of where DC arete tops out.
content.location: Starts on jugs in the middle of the smaller overhung side of the Grandma's Hump boulder and traverses right towards DC Arete and the Spider Pig boulder. Tops out before the left corner and slightly before DC Arete.

content.description: Starts around the corner from Rata En Mi Sopa. The crux is down low and the top ten feet are easy.
content.protection: At least three pads and a couple spotters
content.location: Around the backside of Grandma's Hump, just past Laidback Steve and the Big Air boulder. Starts on a rail and works up large flakes. Tall.

content.description: Sit start on the left arete of the small overhung corner facing the Big Air boulder. Shoot up to crimp rail and then hit the lip. Work left around the corner of the lip and press your way onto the slab.
content.location: Sit starts on the left overhung corner of Grandma's Hump facing the Big Air boulder and goes straight up.

content.description: Sit start on the horn on the right side of the walk down off of Grandma's Hump boulder. Heel hook and work your way up and right until the arete ends, then rock over and top out.
content.location: Starts on the far left corner of Grandma's Hump facing the Spider Pig Boulder. To the left of Grandma's Cookies.

content.description: Start on two slots about 6 feet to the left of Enter The Duat and finish by topping out on the finish of DC Arete.
content.location: Starts 6 feet left of Enter The Duat - two pockets in a horizontal seam - then moves up to a "V" shaped notch on the lip and traverses left on lip and face holds to DC arete.

content.description: Sit start on a large rail to the right of Enter The Duat. Work up and left to a triangle point above the lip, then traverse right, and top out on Rata En Mi Sopa.
content.location: Center route on the side of Grandma's Hump that faces Big Air boulder. Starts on an obvious edge.

content.description: Beautiful large boulder with traverses, highballs, overhung, and slab
